plist.dict:
Disabled
EnvironmentVariables
CATALINA_HOME @@installdir@@/tomcat JAVA_HOME /Library/Java/Home
Label org.getrailo OnDemand
ProgramArguments
@@installdir@@/connector/launchd_wrapper.sh run
RunAtLoad <@@RuntAtLoadFlag@@/> ServiceDescription Railo Tomcat StandardErrorPath @@installdir@@/launchd.stderr StandardOutPath @@installdir@@/launchd.stdout UserName root
